title: Why Google Pixel XL fast charging is so slow?
content:
I have no original charger for my Google Pixel XL and cord too. 
I bought BlitzWolf fast charger with type-C and PD and cable:

But when I charging Google Pixel XL I get only additional 72% of battery charge for 2 hours of charging. Why so long?

Perhaps this cable is not fast enought? It's USB 2.0 in description. I need USB 3.0 cable?  The charger is ok?

How long should be fast charging for Google Pixel XL?
